name: Logans Quest
description:
In this game, you are deep in the recesses of a dangerous jungle.  It`s an unforgiving place few explorers have survived.  But you've got courage, because you're with Logan, the world famous jungle explorer and fortune hunter extraordinaire.  The lure of hidden treasure draws you and Logan deeper and deeper into the bush.  Help Logan find all of the hidden treasure before time runs out.

Instructions

Use the arrow keys to run, the space bar to jump and C to crouch.

Credits

Coding  

Mike Brascome

Music

Digya Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
